description: Numbers that are congruent to {1, 2, 3} mod 5.
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,0,1,-1).
formula: G.f.  x*(1+x+x^2+2*x^3) / ( (1+x+x^2)*(x-1)^2 ). - R. J. Mathar, Oct 08 2011a(n)= 2*floor((n-1)/3)+n. [From Gary Detlefs, Dec 22 2011]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
